title: Why should anyone be executed by a non-skill shot?
body:
You are in a team fight as Zed, you ult, get a triple kill, juke other players, and the enemy is following you. You out play them and port back to your shadow, but Shaco keeps following. You have 10% health and you have gotten away. Think again! Shaco throws his dagger, you can't side step so you get shut down. It was an amazing Shaco out play!

My thought is that a non-skill shot should never execute or hard cc you, it should leave you with 1 health to be killed with auto or a skill shot -- a real skill shot.
